item.name: Maul (UA)
item.text: Mastery (Topple, Prerequisite: Heavy, Reach, or Versatile Property): If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 8 + your Proficiency Bonus + the ability modifier used to make the attack roll. On a failed save, the creature has the Prone condition.
Source: Unearthed Arcana: Player's Handbook Playtest 8 p. 22
